item.description:
Wazzup Incubators!!

Come on out this Thursday for another exciting week of improv games and all around zaniness. I'll be mixing around some of our favorites with some new exercises fresh off of a improv seminar I took a couple week back. I look forward to playing, smiling, and laughing with you all.

So bring yourself, your silliest face, and a friend! Remember there's no previous improv experience required!

Same time, place, and bat channel at the Democracy Center!

Any questions?

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be trying to make really cool sound effects!
item.name: Improv Academy 4: Incubators on Patrol!!!
